ISSUE.TITLE: Params are empty when branch is empty
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When - When you do not set any branch in the Create Build Option but set params Issue - params in the build context is empty when you want to go with default branch of your repo but want to use some params Reproduce - Set a parameter value like `test : 2` and trigger the build. Log `ctx.build.params` which will be empty
